name: NOTES - Soundtrack + Music Sheets
detailed_description:
Package includes songs from the game, all in high-quality mp3 format (320 kbps). All tracks are solo guitar songs. Additionally, there are PDF files with standard music notation and guitar tabs for every song, if someone is interested in how to play it.

Tracklist
Track 01 - Notes
Track 02 - Home
Track 03 - Distance
Track 04 - Calm Sea

short_description: Package includes songs from the game, all in high-quality mp3 (320 kbps). All tracks are solo guitar songs. Additionally, there are PDF files with standard music notation and guitar tabs for every song.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core

  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
